quiz.question: What is considered to be a personal information and should not be shared to the public?
Your friend wants to use your email address to sign up for a website. What should you do?
options: No passwords are meant to be secret
quiz.answer: No passwords are meant to be secret

quiz.question: What is best password practice?
options: Use the same password for all accounts
Use a password that is easy to remember
Use a password that is hard to guess
Use a password that is easy to guess
quiz.answer: Use a password that is hard to guess

quiz.question: You are working on you laptop in a public, yet safe place and you need to leave for a few minutes. What should you do?
What is the best way to protect your computer from viruses?
Your friend forwards an email to you containing a link to a website to download a free game. What should you do?
options: Ask your friend if the website is safe and prevent them from clicking on the link
quiz.answer: Ask your friend if the website is safe and prevent them from clicking on the link

quiz.question: You are in public place with free wifi. You want to enter your password to a secure account such as email or bank account. What should you do?
options: Don't enter your password and wait until you get home
Enter your password but hide your screen
quiz.answer: Don't enter your password and wait until you get home

quiz.question: You get a message on social media from a famous superhero asking you to send money for a donation. What should you do?
options: Ask your friend if this is geniune
Ask a parent or guardian if the message is real
quiz.answer: Ask a parent or guardian if the message is real

quiz.question: What is a good way to create passwords?
options: Use your name as a password
Use a combination of letters, numbers, and symbols with length of 8 or more characters
Use a password that is easy to guess
Use your pets name as a password
quiz.answer: Use a combination of letters, numbers, and symbols with length of 8 or more characters

quiz.question: You are on a website and you see a pop-up that says you have won a free trip. What should you do?
Your computer recently start running slow and low on disk space without downloading anything. You tried restarting the computer, but it did not help much. What should you do?
options: Ignore the problem as it is normal
Delete some files to free up space
Ask a parent or guardian for help
quiz.answer: Ask a parent or guardian for help

quiz.question: What should you avoid while browsing the internet?
Which of the following is a definite way to confirm if a website is not secure?
options: The website has https:// in the URL
The website has a lock icon in the URL
The website has a warning sign in the URL
The website has a green checkmark in the URL
quiz.answer: The website has a warning sign in the URL

quiz.question: You see an ad that says the latest gaming console is on sale with 90% discount. What should you do?
options: Click on the ad as you have been waiting for the console
Ignore the ad as it is too good to be true
quiz.answer: Ignore the ad as it is too good to be true

quiz.question: Who is responsible for your online safety?
You can download any game you want from the internet if you have antivirus installed in your system.
You should never share your password with anyone.
You should always keep your computer updated with the latest software.
You should always share your personal information with anyone who asks for it.
You should always click on pop-ups that say you have won a prize.
You are new to the social media network and you see a new game that predicts which car will you have in 5 years but asks for personal information. What should you do?
options: Enter your personal information as the social media network is popular

quiz.question: How can you protect your accounts in better way?
options: Use different passwords for different accounts
Do not write down your passwords

quiz.question: You get a SMS from an unknown number that says your package is delayed and click on the URL to confirm you still want the package. What should you do?
options: Click on the URL as you ordered a package recently
Check the account you ordered the package from and track the package from official website
quiz.answer: Check the account you ordered the package from and track the package from official website

quiz.question: Someone from your social media network asks for your address to send you a gift. What should you do?
options: Ask a parent or guardian if it is safe to share your address
quiz.answer: Ask a parent or guardian if it is safe to share your address

quiz.question: Someone on your social media network is being mean to you. What should you do?
options: Ask a parent or guardian for help
quiz.answer: Ask a parent or guardian for help
